File

File

Add description here

General usage is as follows:

File *obj=new(File);
File_t.<func to call>(obj, <params>);
...
delete(File,obj);
See Also

File_t

File_t
extern const struct
File_t

The struct that creates and performs operations on objects of type File.

See Also

File

Variables
pathSeparator
const char pathSeparator

A char containing the default path separator defined by the OS.  The File_t object will work with all file separator types regardless of the current OS.

Functions
exists
bool (
*exists
)(const String * const path)

Determines if the given path exists as either a file or a directory.

Parameters
path

A string object containing the path to the folder or directory in question

Returns

True if the given path exists as a file or directory.  False if it does not exist.

isDir
bool (
*isDir
)(const String * const path)

Determines if the given path exists as a directory.

Parameters
path

A string object containing the path to the folder in question

Returns

True if the given path exists as a directory, false otherwise.

isFile
bool (
*isFile
)(const String * const path)

Determines if the given path exists as a file.

Parameters
path

A string object containing the path to the file in question.

Returns

True if the given path exists as a file, false otherwise.

isPipe
bool (
*isPipe
)(const String * const path)

Determines if the given path exists as a pipe.

Parameters
path

A string object containing the path to the pipe in question.

Returns

True if the given path exists as a pipe, false otherwise.
